Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.accounting.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAccount, IBasicAccount, IKPICollector, java.io.Serializable

    public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements IKPICollector, IAccount, java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of Account KPIs for any basic Account.

    pschatzmann
